# Summary

New market-rate housing generates substantial local vacancies through [move-out chains](../aggregators/move-out-chains.qmd).

# Details

In a case study of a 512-unit condominium tower in Honolulu, researchers identified at least 180 verified local vacancies within three years of completion, with scaled estimates suggesting over 500 total induced vacancies [@FangKimTyndall2025].
